CAREER SUMMARY
BRIDGESTONE SABANCI TYRE MANUFACTURING AND TRADIND INC.
November 2018 – December 2023
Managed and executed a 90 Million EUR sales activity in 40+ countries.
Increased sales by 270 % in 5 years.
Aligned sales organization’s objectives with firm business strategy
through active participation in corporate strategic planning, sales
strategy development, forecasting, sales resource planning, and
budgeting.
Continually assessed current business distribution channels, developed
and evaluated their performance and managed conflict by ensuring
alignment with territory plans.
Achieved satisfactory profit ratio and market share in relation to pre-set
KPI’s CANDIDATE
ALİ BASKIN
PERSONAL DETAILS
LOCATION
Istanbul
QUALIFICATIONS
HACETTEPE UNIVERSITY
MBA (Master of Business Administration)
CAREER SUMMARY
BRIDGESTONE SABANCI TYRE MANUFACTURING AND TRADIND INC.
November 2018 – December 2023
Managed and executed a 90 Million EUR sales activity in 40+ countries.
Increased sales by 270 % in 5 years.
Aligned sales organization’s objectives with firm business strategy
through active participation in corporate strategic planning, sales
strategy development, forecasting, sales resource planning, and
budgeting.
Continually assessed current business distribution channels, developed
and evaluated their performance and managed conflict by ensuring
alignment with territory plans.
Achieved satisfactory profit ratio and market share in relation to pre-set
KPI’s.
Maintained sales volume, product mix and selling price by keeping
current with supply and demand, changing trends, economic
indicators and competitors.
Established sales objectives by forecasting and developing annual sales
quotas for regions and territories; projected expected sales volume and
profit for existing and new products.
Implemented international sales programs by developing field sales
action plans.
Contributed to team effort by accomplishing related results as needed.
Planned to ensure achievement of divisional and personal target in
alignment with company sales policies and strategies.
Liaised with other company functions to ensure achievement of sales
objectives.
Carried out regular field visits to current clients and potential/ new
clients to discuss their evolving needs and providing solutions
accordingly.
YATAŞ GROUP
July 2015 – November 2018
Increased sales by 170% in 3.5 years.
Achieved regional sales operational objectives by contributing regional
sales information and recommendations to strategic plans and reviews;
preparing and completing action plans; resolving problems; completing
audits; identifying trends and determining regional sales system
improvements.
Achieved regional sales financial objectives by forecasting
requirements; preparing an annual budget; scheduling expenditures;
analyzing variances and initiating corrective actions.
Analyzed regional market trends and discovered new opportunities for
growth through regular and continuous field visits.
Maintained and expanded customer base by regularly visiting
customers twice a month; building and maintaining rapport with key
customers and identifying new customer opportunities.
Recommended product lines by identifying new product opportunities,
surveying consumer needs and tracking competitors.
Forecasted quarterly and annual profits.
Collected customer feedback as well as market research.
Prepared sales reports and submitted them to senior management.
Developed dealer network in terms of sales, quality and coverage.
Designed and implemented new business models and campaigns to
expand business.
Created sales strategies, set goals, planned and ensured execution for
related sales channels.
Followed profitability of each customer on responsible categories,
provided proactive action plans to secure profitability as well as stable
growth.
Ensured achievement with assigned Key Accounts based on sales
policies, strategies and tactics.
Maintained and increased sales of services and products for potential
and existing customers.
SUMMARY
Highly motivated and ambitious Sales Manager. A dynamic professional with
a proven record of generating and increasing sales, managing projects and finalizing targets from concept to completion. Adaptable and transformational leader with an ability to create opportunities that further develop organizational goals. Grown up in Germany with an MBA degree and native speaker level of German, English and Turkish.
For further information please contact Jan Johnston on 01695 570 696 or email janj@johnston-vere.co.uk

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
